wave: Kukanganisa kufambisa simba pasina kutakura zvinhu
frequency: Huwandu hwemasaisai anotenderera pane imwe nguva
wavelength: Distance pakati penzvimbo mbiri dzinoenderana dzewaisai
amplitude: Kusuduruka kukuru kwenzvimbo kubva pakuenzanisa kwayo mumasaisai
electromagnetic spectrum: Range yezvose zvinogoneka electromagnetic wave frequency
voltage: Musiyano ungangoita pakati pemapoinzi maviri mudunhu
magnetism: Simba rinoitwa nemagineti pane zvimwe zvinhu
electromagnet: Magnet yakagadzirwa nemagetsi emagetsi kuburikidza nekoiri
electroscope: Instrument inoona kuvepo uye chiratidzo chemagetsi
series: Denderedzwa ine zvese zvikamu zvakabatana mune imwechete loop
parallel: Denderedzwa rine zvikamu zvakabatana mumapazi akawanda
resistance: Kupikisa kuyerera kwemagetsi emagetsi mune conductor
ohm mutemo: Hukama pakati pemagetsi, zvazvino, uye kuramba (V = IR)
lenzi: Transparent material iyo inogona kutarisisa kana kusiyanisa maranzi emwenje
kufungisisa: Kudzokera shure kwechiedza, ruzha, kana mamwe masaisai kubva pamusoro
refraction: Kupeta kwechiedza sezvachinopfuura kubva kune imwe svikiro kuenda kune imwe
optics: Bazi refizikisi rinodzidza chiedza uye zvimiro zvayo
